tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EquipmentFailurePrediction (
    equipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_log TEXT,
    failure_prediction BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE equipment_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    log_date DATE,
    maintenance_details TEXT,
    predicted_failure BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FailurePrediction (
    prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    predicted_failure_date DATE,
    predicted_failure_reason TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (log_id) REFERENCES MaintenanceLogs(log_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
   log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   equipment_id INT,
   maintenance_date DATE,
   technician_name STRING,
   maintenance_description STRING
);
CREATE TABLE equipment (id INT, name STRING, serial_number STRING, maintenance_log TEXT, last_maintenance_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE maintenance_log (log_id INT, equipment_id INT, maintenance_type STRING, maintenance_date DATE, technician_id INT, comments TEXT)
CREATE TABLE maintenance_type (type_id INT, type_name STRING, description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE technicians (technician_id INT, name STRING, email STRING, phone_number STRING, specialty STRING)
CREATE TABLE failure_prediction (prediction_id INT, equipment_id INT, predicted_date DATE, prediction_details TEXT)
